page.title: 18Boatyard and Shopping Arcade
page.content: {Boatyards and Chandelry.} A major attraction of the area is the opportunities for sailing and other watersports.Because of this there are three boatyards in the area which not only repair boats but sell and build boats and all types of boating equipment. {St.Mawes Shopping Arcade. This new shopping arcade at St.Mawes was completed in 1985 and consists of a small number of lock up shops,with holiday flats or residential flats above. The shops are very attractively laid out and the shops facing the sea_front have large windows.Within the arcade is a greengrocers,a patiserie and delicatessen and a gift shop which specialises in selling hand made rag dolls which have been locally made. {PTO
